item.title: ✨ Easy with Python ☆ Estimated elapsed time after death ✨
item.description: # What if there was a corpse in front of you? (quoted;DetectiveConan"SweetColdCourier”) When Conan finds his body, he thinks about the post-mortem time at the very beginning, right? If you know the estimated time of death, you can narrow down the suspects greatly (^o^)/ Therefore, this time we will introduce how to obtain more details about the elapsed time after death! #Example There was a man’s body in a refrigerated car set at room temperature of 16°C.
